text: Fon Angwafo III of Mankon (1 May 1925 â€“ 21 May 2022) was a Cameroonian traditional ruler and politician. Fon Angwafo III was a member of the Parliament of Cameroon from 1962 to 1988. He also was the first vice chair of the Cameroon People's Democratic Movement. He died on 21 May 2022, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cameroonian politicians
title: Fon Angwafo III of Mankon
